headline: Health Insurance Market to Reach USD 3.6 Billion by 2031 Amid Rising Healthcare Costs and Expanding Digital Distribution | By DataM Intelligence
summary: According to DataM Intelligence, "The Health Insurance Market Size reached USD 2.2 billion in 2022 and is projected to rise to USD 3.6 billion by 2031, growing at a CAGR of 6.4% during the forecast period 2024–2031." The Health Insurance Market is expanding steadily, driven by the rising burden of chronic diseases, growing healthcare costs, and increasing demand for comprehensive coverage across emerging and developed economies.

headline: Dental Insurance Market Forecast & Growth Trends Report 2025-2033: Rising Oral Health Awareness, Employer-Sponsored Coverage and Dental Care Costs Drive Global Growth
summary: The global dental insurance market is projected to grow from $200 billion in 2024 to $428.32 billion by 2033, driven by a CAGR of 8.83% from 2025 to 2033. Factors such as rising oral health awareness, increasing dental care costs, and expanded employer-sponsored coverage are key growth drivers. Popular in developed economies like the U.S. and Europe, dental insurance is gaining traction in emerging markets due to rising incomes and health literacy. headline: Eleanor Health Joins Cigna Healthcare's and Evernorth Behavioral Health's Network, Expanding In-Network Addiction Care For Millions
summary: Eleanor Health, a fully integrated behavioral health medical home delivering care for people affected by substance use disorder (SUD), today announced it has joined Cigna Healthcare and Evernorth Behavioral Health networks. Through this agreement, Eleanor Health is now an in-network provider for Cigna and Evernorth members, expanding access to evidence-based addiction and mental health services across the United States.

content.title: Eleanor Health Joins Cigna Healthcare's and Evernorth Behavioral Health's Network, Expanding In-Network Addiction Care For Millions
content.summary: Eleanor Health, a fully integrated behavioral health medical home delivering care for people affected by substance use disorder (SUD), today announced it has joined Cigna Healthcare and Evernorth Behavioral Health networks. Through this agreement, Eleanor Health is now an in-network provider for Cigna and Evernorth members, expanding access to evidence-based addiction and mental health services across the United States.

thumbnail.caption: Eleanor Health provides comprehensive, evidence-based addiction and mental health care both virtually and in-person.
